prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a segmented body and vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles an insect, featuring multiple legs and spiky armor.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests, with a unique spiral design on its body.
Design a creature with purple and red accents, known for its fast-paced movements.
Make a Pokemon that can curl into a ball for protection, showcasing a striking color palette.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves from a small insect to a larger, more menacing form.
Give me a Pokemon with a round shape and a fierce expression, perfect for competitive battles.
